page.title: 02MERTON TODAY
page.content:
There are some 300 people living in{Merton}of whom 60 are children (20%) and 75 are over sixty (25%).
Much of the land and many of the houses in the village belong to{The {Clinton Estate}.Occupiers lease or rent their homes and farms.
The village has a{Church},{ { Chapel},{Parish Hall},{Playing Field {, The Maltscoop Inn}and{The Clinton {School},in addition to{Merton Stores and the Post Office.
Some employment is provided locally by {The Clinton Estate}, {The {North Devon Clay Company},the garage and coach firm of {Agrimotors}and on local farms,but over half of those in employment travel more than five miles to their place of work.
